ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d rather say: REST is a set of design patterns. One of these patterns is Uniform Interface . The Web is an application that uses this (among others)

On Jun 5, 2005, at 9:39 PM, Roger L. Costello wrote:

> REST is a design pattern that uses HTTP.

I'd rather say:

REST is a set of design patterns. One of these patterns is 'Uniform  
Interface'. The Web is
an application that uses this (among others) design pattern and HTTP  
is the uniform interface
in this case.

Jan
